ReportText: Exam: CHEST AP (1 VIEW) History: POST OPEN HEART SURGERY X 5 DAYS Comparison: [DATE] Findings: Heart size is stable. Sternotomy wires are noted. A right arm PICC terminates at the SVC. There is persistent left lower lobe atelectasis. The right lung is clear. No pneumothorax. Impression: Stable chest. Electronically Signed by: [[PERSONALNAME], MD
